menu.title: Fitness menu
menu.descr: The 'Fitness' menu is a new approach to cooking: more fresh vegetables and fruits. For people who are interested in sports; active and healthy. This is a completely new product with an optimal price and high quality!

menu.title: Lenten Menu
menu.descr: Our special 'Lenten Menu' is a careful selection of ingredients: no animal products. Complete harmony with yourself and nature in every element!

menu.title: Premium menu
menu.descr: Menu 'Premium' - we use not only beautiful packaging design, but also high-quality execution of dishes. Red fish, seafood, fruits - restaurant menu without going to the restaurant!
